public interface Adaptor
extends java.rmi.Remote

Provides access to some datatype in some datasource.

Method Summary
 void clearCache()
          Clears any caches being used by the adaptor.

          Closes all connections opened by the adaptor.

                         throws AdaptorException

closeAllConnections

public void closeAllConnections()
                         throws AdaptorException
Closes all connections opened by the adaptor.

Throws:
AdaptorException

clearCache

public void clearCache()
                throws AdaptorException
Clears any caches being used by the adaptor. This should be called if the data in the database changes during the adaptors lifetime to prevent the adaptor becoming out of sync with the database. Not all adaptors will necessarily use caches, in those cases this method will do nothing.

Throws:
AdaptorException
